author: Magimix
title: Gazpacho
instructions_list: Peel the cucumber. Remove the stalk, pith and seeds from the pepper.
Roughly chop the vegetables. Peel the garlic.
Process all the ingredients through the Extra Press for a smooth mixture (or use the Juice Filter if you would like a thinner mixture).
Season with salt, pepper and olive oil.
Refrigerate for a minimum of 3 hours.
